solution_line_template: The cat got a {head_start_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}=<<{head_start_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={head_start_hours}>>{head_start_hours} hour head start
The rabbit goes {rabbit_speed}-{cat_speed}=<<{rabbit_speed}-{cat_speed}={speed_difference}>>{speed_difference} mph faster than the cat
So it takes {cat_head_start_distance}/{speed_difference}=<<{cat_head_start_distance}/{speed_difference}={time_to_catch_up}>>{time_to_catch_up} hour for the rabbit to catch up
